title: Designing In-Depth Mathematical Learning through STEAM Integrated Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental math concepts and job-related problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Projects integrating and solving real-life problems through mathematics, accessible via smartphones for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze and model complex mathematical problems through STEAM projects
Learners can present three or more real-life applications of mathematical concepts by integrating them with other academic domains (e.g., science, arts).
Learners can improve their mathematical problem-solving strategies two or more times by reflecting on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
